thread.section_title: Paper Tube Co. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Paper Tube Co. | www.papertube.co
thread.title: Christopher Day
thread.title_full: Paper Tube Co. reviewed by Christopher Day

author: Christopher Day
title: Christopher Day
text: Ordered my sample pieces and they were here the Next Day. The products were just as shown on their website. My additional follow-up order for a larger quantity is currently in process... The Customer Service staff was extremely attentive and helpful in every way. I greatly appreciate their professionalism. I look forward to doing more business with this company in the future.
